website_summaries.verdict: Super durable yet comfortable backpack that provides plenty of padding to protect your laptop.
pros: This backpack is perfect for taking your electronic gadgets wherever you go
The padded sleeve for a 15-inch laptop offers enough protection for day-to-day journeys
We love the sleek design and quality of the hardware, and the fact it stands upright when placed down
cons: Can tear near the straps over time if overloaded

customer_reviews.title: There is no better bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my freshman year of college back in 2011. I should've graduated by now but that really isn't relevant. I've literally beaten the f*** out of this bag for almost 5 years now. The only thing that's gone wrong is the little leather straps attached the zippers. They wound up coming loose and falling off. However, i have never had a bag last more than a year of school and this one is still completely in tact. No tears. No loose stitches. No broken zippers. I don't think I will ever get another bag ever again. If I do though, it will definitely be one of these.
customer_reviews.author: EverythingIsGreen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: In all my time as a student, I have used exclusively JanSport backpacks. My previous JanSport had lasted me over seven years, both through middle school and high school. This new backpack has only been in my possession for 2 months and it is already falling apart. The strap on the right-hand side has torn along the seam, while the zipper to the small compartment has threads coming off of it and all but one of the little straps attached to the zippers have fallen off. For the $54 that I spent on it, this is far from the bag that I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jozef Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Parts of Backpack Began Breaking After A Month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack prior to the start of the next school year because of the good reviews. At first, I noticed how comfortable it was and how useful the pockets were. After a month, the leathery pull strings to open/close the zippers all broke. Other people in my school had this same backpack and their's broke very easily as well. Another few months go by and the main zippers stitch begins to break. By the end of the school year, a good amount of the interior stitching was falling apart. I wouldn't recommend this backpack for school, but maybe if it's just holding a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Millones

customer_reviews.title: Best. Backpack. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best backpack I've ever owned for school. I bought two for my wife and I since we're both back in school. We both back our backpacks heavy with books and laptop. Not once have I had any problems with it. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. If you're thinking about getting this backpack but are unsure, let me make you sure. Get it. You won't regret it. After 2 years, my straps are still attached, the bottom is still intact and all the zippers are still functional. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend JanSport
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal JanSport fan, and have been since high school. Their quality and style are always top notch. All my school age kids have and will have JanSport backpacks. That's why when I was looking at computer bags, I bought this one. But it was a gift, and he didn't want a backpack. I had no use for it personally so I had to return it. The return policy is great.
customer_reviews.author: t0mistaf12

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: you might be able to fit one book and one binder....so small. BEWARE...if you return it, you have to pay for shipping...what a bunch of *&^%
customer_reviews.author: Miryam Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: My main bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my main bag if I'm going on adventures or just out to the court. The zippers nor tracks have never broken. The bag hasn't faded and I live in TX. It's a tough bag if you're trying to haul equipment to just books. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gneius29

customer_reviews.title: Well made - great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Months later it’s still like new! Heavy fabric and well constructed. Holds our granddaughters school books (I swear she carries 20 pounds). She choose the navy blue color - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: For years I used a JanSport backpack w/ a real ...
customer_reviews.text: For years I used a JanSport backpack w/ a real leather bottom, wider (and more cushioned) shoulder straps, and a strap at its bottom that served as a waist strap. Sadly, all of these "features" were missing in this purchase. I'd still be using it (4 times a wk, 52 wks a year, when I swim) had the stitching at the bottom, holding the front, smaller pouch, not come apart.
customer_reviews.author: rarely complain

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The ties on the zipper ripped off in about a month, and then a huge whole ripped in the bottom corner of the backpack. Other than clear quality issues, the backpack itself isn’t very large or comfortable. It doesn’t have any stretch or give, and the surface area of the bottom isn’t very large, making it hard to fit more than one laptop and one textbook. It doesn’t distribute weight well either and the straps pull heavily on your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy, good quality. I have my Jansport backpack from when I was a teenager (20+ years ago) and compared the quality of the two and I was pleased. I used mine all through high school and college. Hopefully this one lasts my son 20+ years. The people complaining about the leather getting dirty don't seem to realize that's part of the charm of a good, worn-in backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael McKEnzie

customer_reviews.title: Jansport Backpack(Navy Blue)
customer_reviews.text: I like Jansport backpacks and everything about them. This backpack I bought is is awesome. Material feels strong and durable. Stitching is perfect, no strings sticking out. Roomy and the color is perfect. I recommend this product if you are looking for a new backpack. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid everyday backpack for college and short trips.
customer_reviews.text: Enough space for books and a few clothes for the gym or short day trips. Buying a rain cover is one addition that has been useful for me.Size Medium.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect size for my day to day use
customer_reviews.text: Have not had it very long so cannot speak to the long term durability. However, the materials feel durable, and the quality down to the small details is noticeable. It is a perfect size for my day to day use, not too big not too small. It is exactly what I wanted as far as the style goes. Could maybe say it is 4.5 stars because there is no padding in the lap-top pouch however i'm not sure how helpful that would be in a drop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, this is an excellent back pack - my last jansport lasted 1989-2019. This is a Big pack - not suitable for a child & it's on the heavy side
customer_reviews.author: mdquear58

customer_reviews.title: 18 Years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I've had this model of Jansport backpack for the past 18 years. It's my go-to bag. I've taken it around the world and abused it heavily and it's still going strong. I just got this bag for my son, as he outgrew his preschool pack. It's a bit large on him at 6, but he'll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: gnichols

customer_reviews.title: The product description led me to believe that this was ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description led me to believe that this was made in USA, but it's made in Vietnam. Otherwise it's functional, though the laptop sleeve is not padded and provides almost no protection from a drop. It'll do as a temporary bag until my Filson is returned from a repair job.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Badger

customer_reviews.title: COLLEGE BOUND
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR GRAND DAUGHTER FOR COLLEGE . SHE LOVES IT CAN NOT WAIT FOR SCHOOL TO START. VERY STURDY AND IN STYLE.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever I had this model in 70s
customer_reviews.text: May not be the fanciest. But the quality and construction are as good as ever a well made product that keeps on going when the Chinese imports fall apart This bag is a replacement for one that went thru graduate school and medical school late 70-80s The reason I need a replacement is one of my kids permanently borrowed the original These bags can take anything without a problem 6 inch books lab chemical aromas everything and keep going. Keep up the good work JanSport
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Strap ripped within the first month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to use for college and within the first month of having it, one of the straps has started to tear. I plan to send it in to Jansport, but didn’t think I would need to use the warranty this soon. Kind of bummed.
customer_reviews.author: atomicvibes

customer_reviews.title: Good functionality and solid design
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Holding up well. Not too puffy like some large capacity backpacks can be—it has a compact profile when not full.
customer_reviews.author: Sroujin

customer_reviews.title: Durable roomy good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, the navy color was perfect, looks fashionable in an understated way. This is for my teen son in high school and the size was perfect, it's not a giant bag, but roomy enough, especially considering they don't have lockers. The leather pulls on the zippers break off easily, other than that it's quite durable, non staining, and a good looking bag.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag for a 3rd grader!!
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy and well made replacement for our 3rd grader's John Cena backpack. This bag is stuffed with books and binders and has held up beautifully thus far (it still looks brand new). He's rough on bags so this purchase was a no-brainer. We have always had great success with Jansport backpacks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of expensive but these things are stylish.
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. Didn't really get this for anything else other than style. I mean, it has a laptop sleeve so that's good I guess. Every backpack should, who doesn't have a laptop? There's a smaller pocket in the front that has sewn in pockets for 2 pens and the thinnest cellphone ever (can't put anything else in this "larger" pocket other than more pens maybe?). Other than that, it's a pretty straight forward backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, good size
customer_reviews.text: My teen son uses this as a backpack for school and he likes it a lot. Especially the leather at the bottom gives it a nice look. After using it for two months now no signs of wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: shop girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for College
customer_reviews.text: It was a present and was loved by the recipient as she showed off its features: laptop pocket, leather bottom, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: mikeL

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: My middle school dreams have finally come true. 😍 It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rugged, well made backpack to use as a diaper bag. It has plenty of room for everything you need for a newborn when you are out and about. Plus my two other kiddos put their stuff in there. My husband likes it because it's isn't a regular diaper bag. He slings it over one shoulder and out the door we go! I liked this one so much I got a second one for my 13 year old son to use at school. His is orange.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Free

customer_reviews.title: Nice Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is well made, sturdy and practical. Should hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Arizonan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pictures and description. Love this bag. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this back pack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack. Very study and comfortable. Held up very well on the trip to France for the Women's World Cup. The leather at the bottom is very rugged yet soft.
customer_reviews.author: Neffster

customer_reviews.title: Many useful pockets.
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter than I expected, but seems well constructed. Arrived well packaged with tags. Holds allot of books, thats for sure. Many useful pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Saracanite

customer_reviews.title: Used Red Bull can in backpack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for my daughter’s birthday. The package arrived and I wrapped it. When she opened it there was this used crushed Red Bull can in the outer pocket??!! Not a great surprise for her birthday. Really disappointed by this. The pocket also smells like Red Bull.
customer_reviews.author: BigG

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love that there's a lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: Masters student here. Tired of carrying all of my materials in shoulder bags. Great product! Love that there's a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy backpack. The only drawback is that it doesn’t have a side pocket for a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bloss

customer_reviews.title: Great College Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Used for years during and after college for carrying up to 2 large textbooks and a laptop with some other personal items in smaller pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Shanta Rashid

customer_reviews.title: After using the backpack about 6 times one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: After using the backpack about 6 times one of the straps came off because it was sewn on the edge. It is a very expensive backpack so how is it possible that the QC station has not detected those defects of confection! I am really upset!
customer_reviews.author: alixela

customer_reviews.title: Not fake but.....
customer_reviews.text: Tags with manufacturer hologram cuted off! No comments from seller (why, who did it)! This is probably a defective item. Not passed the quality control for some reason!
customer_reviews.author: Ilya

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We love these backpacks They are very well made and last for a long time that I've purchased multiple ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am loyal Jansport fan. This is my second ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loyal Jansport fan. This is my second backpack after first one lasted almost 7 years and still usable. This one after use of 3-4 weeks the straps started coming off. I am sending backpack to repair to Jansport as they stand by there product. I will update the review once they fix my bag.
customer_reviews.author: purva vaidya

customer_reviews.title: Standard rugged JanSport bag. This model lacks a hip/waist ...
customer_reviews.text: Standard rugged JanSport bag. This model lacks a hip/waist strap essential for extended or heavy carry.
customer_reviews.author: calart

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my son-in-law. He loves it. Perfect for college
customer_reviews.author: C. Sadler

customer_reviews.title: So nice, we ordered two
customer_reviews.text: So nice, we ordered two. The leather bottom is a nice feature as well as the back being a smooth nylon ( our last one wasn't and ruined shirts), only negative is there is no mesh side pocket for a nalgene bottle.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but lacking side pockets
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack in Navy Blue and I love it, however there are two negative things I can say about it-- There are no side pockets for a water bottle or a travel mug which I find to be slightly irritating. Additionally, the leather zipper pull on the fron pocket has broken like 3 times. I keep re-tying it but eventually it's gonna break, oh well I suppose. Anyhow, it really is a great backpack especially for college students. The bottom is durable and the backpack holds all of my textbooks/laptop nicely :)
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is a college student and going abroad to study. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: JanSport still rocks
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 yo daughter uses this everyday for school. She's 16, so I think that kinda is clear that she's not super gentle. This backpack has held up nicely and I don't see that changing. It's a JanSport.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the everyday on the go hustle and bustle
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the everyday on the go hustle and bustle , I can confidently throw my MacBook in the laptop compartment along with my everyday items and not have and worries . Definitely recommend purchasing if your in the market for a durable backpack with a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: kraig rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. Minor flaw that doesn't impact its function.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is well made and seems reasonably strong. I have been using it for a little over two months now and it is still working just like brand new. The bottom (brown part), however, got dirty and turned into ugly looking black thing. It cannot be seen when you have it on your back, but if you can see it if you flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Nino N.

customer_reviews.title: ... bag which is some weird material gets dark and dirty so fast
customer_reviews.text: The bottom on the bag which is some weird material gets dark and dirty so fast. I have a feeling it will rip in a few more months, Recommend getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have this bag since 2016 and no damaged on suede or the anything. Just buy and feed the capitalism.
customer_reviews.author: yuri

customer_reviews.title: Great college backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is now a freshman in college. I couldn't find this backpack in the stores but found it on Amazon! Really like the leather bottom.My son really likes the sleeve/compartment for the laptop too. Perfect backpack for your high school or college student!
customer_reviews.author: empowered

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed for a $42 backpack to not even last one ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several JanSport backpacks over the years for our six children. Unfortunately, this one lasted only six months. The inner lining between the smaller pockets and the larger compartment ripped out and is unrepairable. Very disappointed for a $42 backpack to not even last one school year.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J. Nisco

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a suede bottom as depicted
customer_reviews.text: Probably a decent enough backpack but kid wanted suede bottom as in picture, but our arrived with plain bottom. Return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronh

customer_reviews.title: Quality backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. It’s light but the material is heavy quality!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hockenbraugh

customer_reviews.title: Must be a pretty good backpack
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter who is starting college. Was exactly what we were expecting. Her father had one when he went to college and was used by my granddaughter until she graduated from high school 25 years later. Must be a pretty good backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Mollygirl

customer_reviews.title: Definite good buy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this backpack. Sturdy, durable, stylish
customer_reviews.author: matthew s.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This pack holds up well. The zippers don't fail and the reinforced bottom is good design. It is big enough to hold several books, or clothes for an overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure this backpack will survive until my 6-year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this backpack will survive until my 6-year old is in high school. He is very rough on it, but it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morretino

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is nice, but very small for all the stuff kids have to carry. Pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Calideb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. The only thing it's missing is a side holder for a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: proactive mom

customer_reviews.title: Super resistant, high quality, like all Jansport products
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack !!! It is not the first time that I have this classic Jansport model, it is my favorite, I recommend it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Juani Chammah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect daypack.
customer_reviews.text: There's room for everything in this backpack. It's handled dayhiking, tons of books, and will soon face a trip to Disney. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spell Family

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I carry like 50 pounds of books everyday, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Phu H.

customer_reviews.title: Leather bottom of bag doesn't stand up to normal Jansport quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this as a school backpack for high school. Within two months the suede/leather bottom got a 2"x2" hole in the bottom of it from the books rubbing. Past the return window of 30 days. Disappointed in this bag. Usually Jansport makes good quality, long lasting products. This one just didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Gippergirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds all my daughters books, all 50 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: EM68

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected, great quality and will fit everything and more !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, great quality and will fit everything and more !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they've replaced it with anything better. But the price went from $10-$40
customer_reviews.text: same flippin bag we used in 1990 this was the ultimate at the time, I don't think they've replaced it with anything better. But the price went from $10-$40......
customer_reviews.author: BigG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice but it could be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. After my boyfriends continuous compliments on it, I bought him one for his birthday. I use it as a carry on for travel and daily to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Grove

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these for my son when he was in grade school or middle school and it lasted him for years! Now that he is in college, he requested that we find another like it. A great, heavy-duty backpack for carrying a lot of heavy books. It also has a laptop pouch, which our old one didn't have. I am so thrilled to find these still available. You get what you pay for and this is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Animal's Wife

customer_reviews.title: total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son who started middle school in August and by November this backpack tore from the bottom. He was carrying a lot of books. However, I was under the impression this was a strong and durable brand. total disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Abby O.

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed. I always wanted one of these as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bottom tore and I only use the back for my laptop and the occasional textbook. Really disappointed. I always wanted one of these as a kid and couldn't afford one. It lasted 3 months. I would return it, but I don't want to jump through hoops. I'll just buy an LL Bean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack.
customer_reviews.text: Classic backpack. My previous one was stolen, and this one is of the same quality. Great pack.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to carry a few things with me when I go hiking. I thought it would be more organized, but the inside is just a big hole. There is a small pocket on the outside (good for cellular), but that's it. Other than that the bag looks cute, carries what I need, and the price was the cheapest I'd seen even out of E-bay mini packs.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived quickly and looks like the picture, pretty happy with it so far...
customer_reviews.author: caro_

customer_reviews.title: Was so happy when I found it online to purchase another
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag when I was younger and don't know what I did with it. Was so happy when I found it online to purchase another. This is my go to book bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Stanley

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this backpack, its light and comfortable straps make it easier, also the extra pockets help allot as well. Very sturdy, nothing has worn and i have had it for almost 7 months now. I and pack as much as I need into it as well.
customer_reviews.author: BreAnna Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, spacious, simple
customer_reviews.text: I've used JanSport over the years, and never had one wear out or break down. Excellent workmanship and designs. This one was bought to carry my base prospecting tools. It needed to be durable. Yes, I would recommend this companies products to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LarryB

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Back Pack for School
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking backpack for high school. Makes the other ones look shabby.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Regrets
customer_reviews.text: The bag had white stains on it when I got it. I regret ordering it on line because I cannot return it so easily and I need it for class ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: mizzeperez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to carry on your back
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything I need for class! Laptop pocket fits my laptop in its sleeve and still has room for textbooks! Very comfortable to carry on your back. The bag is made of very high quality material, especially the zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong back pack
customer_reviews.text: Very strong duarable bag from primary to secondary schoole and still going.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchum Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long stays strong
customer_reviews.text: My other one lasted o we twenty years. Killed me to throw it away. LOVE the new one. I'll keep it for years
customer_reviews.author: Mitch S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't make it like they used to
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this backpack. It arrived 8/25/16 and already has two holes through the suede bottom. Just carried regular private high school books and Mac laptop. Sorry photo is not better he was wearing backpack at the time.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find this, 1 year later holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Katy 13

customer_reviews.title: Great just like the one I had but wore out
customer_reviews.text: Great just like the one I had but wore out. Disappointed I could not get the Penn State version. As I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice color bottom portion of the bag causes jacket to lift up
customer_reviews.author: ButchP

customer_reviews.title: There is so much Spaceeeee
customer_reviews.text: There is so much space I can't believe it. I can't feel the weight of my laptop with this backpack. I'm never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Zan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect student backpack. Great size but holds plenty. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a quite small backpack so it should be used for younger children.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice Jansport backpack, when it delivered there was nothing wrong with it and it was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: rick whitlock

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Got a hole in the leather part after one year.
customer_reviews.author: DanaD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this backpack! Looks nice, very durable. Spacious, not bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: school bag
customer_reviews.text: bought for daughter at school and she seems to like it very well
customer_reviews.author: bikeboy50

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Jansport classic, with significan space. The suade is thought and it lasts. The navy wasn't that navy though. Lighter than what I pictured.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Still sturdy after all these years.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these that I used for over twenty years. It was still good when I gave it to a friend. Now my new one seems to be exactly like the old one - just as sturdy and well built. Gotta give it to Jansport for not fixing what ain't broken!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way, it's just a little small for me , that's all.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect back pack. Probably more for a kid though. Or... perfect if you don't need a large backpack. Awesome overnight bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great service and delivered fast.
customer_reviews.text: It was/is as expected at a fair price and fast service buy again in the future if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L Talend

customer_reviews.title: backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack.It is made well,and has more space than is visible when you first see it.It is a great deal for the money,and came in the mail within 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie K. Doss

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty. I like the detailing and contrast on the bottom. fits my daughter's 15" laptop. Roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: good quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly. Arrived early. Everything we expected. Durable, good quality backpack. Hope to get a few years use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: AngNaka

product_meta.title: JanSport unisex-adult Laptop
feature_bullets: THE MOST TRUSTED NAME IN BACKPACKS - Our belief in our packs is strong! Every JanSport comes with a lifetime warranty. Carry your JanSport with confidence, knowing we'll replace or repair any breaks
THE ICONIC DESIGN – The Right Pack constructed with the original JanSports backpack look, quality & leather bottom. Comes equipped with 15" laptop sleeve & front organizer pocket
OUR EVERYDAY, EVERYWHERE BAG - A daypack that goes from school to fun as quickly as you do with premium durable fabric, straight-cut padded shoulder straps & web haul handle
SCHOOL SUPPLIES CARRIED IN STYLE - Right Pack original classic, pairing that with your outfits is all that is needed to complete a sophisticated style, the ideal pack for everyone's personality
AMERICAN TRADITION IN BACKPACKS – Generations have grown up & come to rely on this trusted brand. Over 50 years of schools, work, road trips, discovering fun, freedom & adventure
